pages.title: Space Station
pages.text: A space station is a pre-built structure that is created in the planet selection screen, provided you have the necessary materials. Space stations are always located in a moon or planet's orbit and provide the ability to place blocks in that orbit dimension.

pages.title: Space Station
pages.text: Space stations are designed to be expanded upon, allowing you to build the base of your dreams over a moon/planet. They always spawn in whatever position you launched your rocket at, so remember the coordinates to avoid losing the structure.
